title: Send In The Congregation: Stories from the Foo Fighters Fans
description: Foo Fighters are one of the biggest bands in the world with millions of record sales and awards to their name. Send In The Congregation looks at the Foo Fighters through the eyes of their fans and asks the question, "Why do you love this band so much?". Their answers are often funny, poignant, and heartbreaking. Every chapter is a journey through someone's life with the must they love creating the backdrop to their story. Send In The Congregation is a love letter from the fans to the band and is a reminder of why music is such an important part of our everyday lives.
author: Rachael Gilliver
